text: Humne har ummat mein ek Rasool bhej diya, aur uske zariye se sabko khabardar kardiya ke “Allah ki bandagi karo aur taghut ki bandagi se bacho”. Iske baad in mein se kisi ko Allah ne hidayat bakshi aur kisi par zalalat musallat ho gayi. Phir zara zameen mein chal phir kar dekhlo ke jhutlane walon ka kya anjaam ho chuka hai
